title: Analysis of post-translationally modified proteins using mass spectroscopy
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: The use of the mass spectrometer purchased and installed as a consequence of this award has been extensive both within the University of Manchester academic community and beyond.
findingsText: This award was granted to purchase a mass spectrometer. The particular machine installed at the University of Manchester has been used extensively for the identification of post-translationally modified proteins. Numerous medically-related protein modifications have been identified, characterised and quantified. Healthcare
